trans-unit.source: Specifies how a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control behaves when the control resizes.
trans-unit.target: Especifica como um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> em um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> se comporta quando o controle é redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Essa enumeração é usada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property specifies how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is autosized on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> propriedade especifica como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> é dimensionado automaticamente em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> enumeration and how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> enumeração e como tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> evento.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o exemplo, cole o código a seguir em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o `InitializeStatusBarPanels` método no construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> método manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The width of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> is determined by its contents.
trans-unit.target: A largura do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> é determinada pelo seu conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> does not change size when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control resizes.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> não altera o tamanho quando o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> é redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> shares the available space on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> (the space not taken up by other panels whose <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.None" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Contents" />) with other panels that have their <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize" /> property set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Spring" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> compartilha o espaço disponível no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> (o espaço não ocupado por outros painéis cuja propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize" /> está definida como <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.None" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Contents" />) com outros painéis com a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize" /> definida como <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Spring" />.
